devdoc.details: Database for the validation, storage, and maintanence of TLS certificates

addCertificate(bytes,bytes32).details: Retrieves issuer, parses and validates cert, stores cert if valid

params.issuerID: The SHA-256 hash of an issuing certificate already stored

addSelfsignedCertificate(bytes).details: Parses and validates the provided DER, stores certificate if valid

certExists(bytes32).details: Returns whether certificate is stored in database, i.e. is of version 1 or higher

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getCRLStatus(bytes32).details: Get the CRL status of a stored certificate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getCRLStatus(bytes32).return: revocation status, time of this update, time of expiry of update

getCert(bytes32).details: Get the mandatory fields of the X509certificate struct of a stored certificate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getCert(bytes32).return: version, serial number, not valid before, not valid after, name, public key, issuer identifier

getCertExtensionFields(bytes32).details: Get the extension fields of the X509certificate struct of a stored certificate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getCertExtensionFields(bytes32).return: subject alternative names, CA flag, path length, certificate policy,  key usage

getCertificateStatus(bytes32).details: Checks whether certificate is revoked or expired and whether a certificate in its chain is revoked or expired

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getCertificateStatus(bytes32).return: bool contained in the database, bool expired, bool revoked, bool has a valid chain

getFingerprint(bytes).details: Get the identifier of a certificate

getOCSPStatus(bytes32).details: Get the OCSP status of a stored certificate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getOCSPStatus(bytes32).return: revocation status, time of this update, time of expiry of update

getPublicKeyAndRoot(bytes32,string).details: Get the public key and the identifier of the trust anchor of a certificate and verify that the cert is authoritve for the given domain

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getRootFingerprint(uint256).details: Get the identifier of the trust anchor stored at index 'index'

getRootIDbyCertID(bytes32).details: Get the identifier of the trust anchor of a certificate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

getRootIDbyCertID(bytes32).return: identifier of the certificate's trust anchor

refreshCertificateCRL(bytes32,bytes).details: Parses and validates CRL, updates 'ocsp_status' of certificate if appropriate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

refreshCertificateOCSP(bytes32,bytes).details: Parses and validates OCSP response, updates 'ocsp_status' of certificate if appropriate

params.certID: SHA-256 hash of the certificate concerned

devdoc.title: CertificateStore

addCertificate(bytes,bytes32).notice: Submit a certificate signed by a certificate already stored

addSelfsignedCertificate(bytes).notice: Submit a self-signed certificate to the database

certExists(bytes32).notice: Returns whether certificate is stored in database

getCRLStatus(bytes32).notice: Get the CRL status of a stored certificate

getCert(bytes32).notice: Get the basic information about a certificate

getCertExtensionFields(bytes32).notice: Get the extension information about a certificate

getCertificateStatus(bytes32).notice: Returns the status of a certificate and its chain

getOCSPStatus(bytes32).notice: Get the OCSP status of a stored certificate

getPublicKeyAndRoot(bytes32,string).notice: Get the public key and the identifier of the trust anchor of a certificate

getRootFingerprint(uint256).notice: Get the identifier of the trust anchor stored at index 'index'

getRootIDbyCertID(bytes32).notice: Get the identifier of the trust anchor of a certificate

refreshCertificateCRL(bytes32,bytes).notice: Submit a CRL to update the revocation status of a certificate

refreshCertificateOCSP(bytes32,bytes).notice: Submit an OCSP response to update the revocation status of a certificate
